verses.roman:
svagaṇa-sahite mora mānilā nimantraṇa
ebe kene prabhura mote phiri' gela mana?

synonyms: sva-gaṇa-sahite—accompanied by His personal associates; mora—my; mānilā—accepted; nimantraṇa—invitation; ebe—now; kene—why; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mote—unto me; phiri' gela—has changed; mana—mind.
translation: "He accepted my invitation with His other devotees, and He was kind to me. Why has He now changed so much here at Jagannātha Purī?
